title: 开服务器了，没钱怎么办
author: qq2643589885

replies.author: JarvisStark76
replies.txt_content: 找赞助，自己掏腰包，还有就是借钱

replies.author: xin_liang
replies.txt_content: 找人合租     或者用自己电脑开

replies.author: 镜钥Mirki
replies.txt_content: 那就别开了,没钱还开个毛.

replies.author: a1154662510
replies.txt_content: 找有钱的小学生,或者等暑假

replies.author: GoodYG
replies.txt_content: 办法总是有的，车到山前比有路

replies.author: HAHAML
replies.txt_content: {:10_493:}刚刚过完年  谁都会有点钱    去看看谁可以赞助你吧

replies.author: MM_WW
replies.txt_content: 找赞助呗，基本没有钱的腐竹都是这么搞得
